mapper.select: SELECT * FROM company_review ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_review (company_id, freelancer_id, work_quality_score, timeliness_score, feedback_score, willingness_score, overall_score, review_date, response_data) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{freelancerId}, #{workQualityScore}, #{timelinessScore}, #{feedbackScore}, #{willingnessScore}, #{overallScore}, #{reviewDate}, #{responseData})
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(review_date, '%m-%d') AS date, COUNT(*) AS count FROM company_review WHERE review_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(review_date, '%m-%d')
